definition: insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Mosquitofish, freshwater fish with a taste for mosquito larvae, are highly social.
sentences.chinese: 食蚊鱼是淡水鱼，以蚊子幼虫为食，高度的群体化。

sentences.english: Any of various Old World freshwater fishes of the genus Barbus or Puntius and related genera.
sentences.chinese: 一种东半球鲃属或须鲃属及有关科属的淡水鱼类。

sentences.english: Inspections of freshwater fish at local markets would be stepped up.
sentences.chinese: 会加强检验本地街市售卖的淡水鱼。

sentences.english: Any of about 100 species of small, slender freshwater fishes (family Percidae), native to eastern North America.
sentences.chinese: 鲈形目鲈科镖鲈亚科约一百种小型细长淡水鱼的统称。

sentences.english: Danshui fish balls are balls of fish paste stuffed with meat and garlic served in a light broth.
sentences.chinese: 淡水鱼丸是圆形的鱼酱酿肉和大蒜，加上清淡肉汤。

sentences.english: I’ll show you some freshwater fishing!
sentences.chinese: 我会带你们去钓淡水鱼。

sentences.english: It's so fresh and the flavor is kind of light for a freshwater fish.
sentences.chinese: 因为是淡水鱼，所以鱼肉鲜美，口味也比较淡。

sentences.english: This kind of fish lives in fresh water.
sentences.chinese: 多种小软鳍鱼科淡水鱼。

sentences.english: The Chinese sturgeon is the biggest fresh water fish. The texture construction of it is very special.
sentences.chinese: 中华鲟是淡水鱼类中最大的鱼，生理结构特殊。

sentences.english: A freshwater fish of the family Anabantidae, native to Africa and southeast Asia and including the gourami and climbing perch.
sentences.chinese: 攀鲈一种攀鲈科淡水鱼，产于非洲和东南亚，包括。

sentences.english: Some freshwater fishes such as pike can withstand levels of acidity .
sentences.chinese: 一些诸如梭鱼等淡水鱼可以抵御相当程度的酸性。

sentences.english: European freshwater fish resembling the roach.
sentences.chinese: 类似于斜齿鳊的欧洲淡水鱼。

sentences.english: Four of the world's 10 biggest freshwater fish migrate up the Mekong to spawn.
sentences.chinese: 世界十大大型淡水鱼中有四种会迁移至湄公河产卵。

sentences.english: Any of various small freshwater fishes of the family Cyprinidae, which also includes carps and minnows.
sentences.chinese: 一种东半球鲃属或须鲃属及有关科属的淡水鱼类。

sentences.english: One day some fisherman caught tons of fish called tench.
sentences.chinese: 一些的天渔夫捕捉了被称为鲤鱼类淡水鱼的鱼吨。

sentences.english: Objective To study the infection of freshwater fishes with the encysted metacercaria of Clonorchis sinensis.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解淡水鱼华支睾吸虫囊蚴感染情况。

definition: grouper (Portuguese: garoupa)/also called 鮨/Epinephelinae (subfamily of Serranidae, fish family including grouper)
